Author: bi-the-wayy
Text: Sorry for the late response but thank you so much. I did give it a break yesterday and went a little overboard and gained 1.6lbs overnight so I'm trying not to freak out too hard about that now haha. But I'm hanging in there. Thank you! I just needed a vent.

Author: sankayadeadmon
Text: Hey, sounds like you've been pushing really hard over the last few days and it's now catching up to you.  I've been there and i'd say you're better off having a day where you eat at maintenance, or as high as you feel comfortable, as kind of a reset. Your body will get a bit of a break and you wont end up going completely overboard because you're desperate for food.  Sending hugs <3
